entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
